main event: A sighting of a small white object in Great Falls, Montana, on March 2, 1961, lasting about 5-10 seconds.
interesting points: The object stopped for a moment and then resumed its motion before disappearing behind clouds., The sighting was characterized by a brilliant, shiny appearance suggesting it was at high altitude., Witness observations noted that the object reappeared after being hidden for a moment or two., Preliminary analysis suggested it could be a space vehicle or meteor., The report stated that this sighting correlated with at least three other visual sightings.
